Bibliography

Note: The notation [72] denotes 1972, the year the paper was published. Additional listings are in the author’s Algebra I and II, and in the Russian translations published by MIR Publishers.

If more than one paper by an author appears e.g. in 1981, we list them as [81a], [81b], $\ldots \,$, or sometimes, [81], [81b], $\ldots \,$, or maybe [81], [81a], [81b], $\ldots$ , etc. We apologize for this inconsistency.

[72]
S. S. Abhyankar, W. Heinzer and P. Eakin, On the uniqueness of the coefficient ring in a polynomial ring, J. Algebra 23 (1972), 310–342.
